title: Kraft Singles debuts 'Grilled Cheese-cense' for National Grilled Cheese Day
body: Kraft Singles wants to help you enjoy the aroma of a fresh grilled cheese sandwich without having to fire up your cooktop.The company is offering "Grilled Cheese-cense" as part of National Grilled Cheese Day, which was Monday.Kraft Singles shared the cheese-scented incense is being given away until Thursday as part of a sweepstakes.
